nodes.text: Karvas Toll was a male Human who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

Toll grew up in the slums of the planet Taris and after watching an Imperial propaganda program on the HoloNet, he joined the Galactic Empire. He spent a short time training offworld and then returned to Taris, to assist Imperial Intelligence cells on the world. Following the abduction of the Givin scientist Saludor Narubo by the a team of Rebel Alliance agents, Toll trailed the agents and attempted to rescue Narubo.
